name: Botleeg
description:
wealocm to beoaoeoeo botleasofgw leeg, yoiur goak is toto survivee, here instructiom:

if u seee bloc thattsa ssayb woodm gry it

caan yuo survivea was long?

instructions:

left click (or tap) to shoot

right click (or tap) to build a crappy block

WASD to move

hold down L-Shift to sprint

instructions (mobile):

tap the sword icon to be able to shoot, then tap anywhere to shoot

tap the B icon to build, then tap anywhere to build

use the D'pad to move, you can't build or shoot while moving

Hold down the S button to sprint
